price: This is how We make the wrongdoers take control over one another[43] because of what they used to do.
arabic: وَكَذَٰلِكَ نُوَلِّي بَعۡضَ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ بَعۡضَۢا بِمَا كَانُواْ يَكۡسِبُونَ
footnotes: [43] By misguiding and inciting to do evil deeds.
